alert.note: Alert for Eastern Polk; Greater Rutherford; Henderson; Polk Mountains; Rutherford Mountains (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:59PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rutherford, Henderson and western Polk Counties through 445 PM EST... At 359 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Downtown Asheville to 11 miles south of Brevard. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Flat Rock, Mountain Home, Laurel Park, Lake Lure, Saluda, Chimney Rock Village, Chimney Rock State Park, Bat Cave and Etowah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Polk; Greater Rutherford; Henderson; Polk Mountains; Rutherford Mountains
